data.description: Contributing to the development of uCertify Learn, an EdTech mobile app with 15K+ users. Building scalable Android and iOS apps using Flutter and Dart, integrating REST APIs, Firebase services, and ensuring a smooth, responsive user experience.

Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter for Android and iOS. Worked on Kivo.ai, an HRMS product with 1K+ users, optimizing performance by 40%, integrating REST APIs, and Firebase services.
